steps.title: Request Intake
steps.description: Field team submits request for equipment or services.

steps.title: Validation & Enrichment
steps.description: System validates completeness, enriches with customer data, pricing, and availability.

steps.title: Assignment
steps.description: Platform assigns job to appropriate technician or crew based on availability and routing.

steps.title: Execution
steps.description: Technician completes the job and updates system with results, photos, or measurements.

steps.title: Reporting & Billing
steps.description: System generates report or invoice based on job results and rules.
